name: backend
description: - first setup the database - npm install - node server.js # Database Setup(Database currenly only on local computer) ## Create a postgres database with the properties: - name = 'usersdb' - username = 'postgres' - password = 'postgres' - check db.config.js in backend files if you want to change to your liking ## How to generate sample data? - Send a POST request to http://localhost:6969/api/users/generate_sample_data - And then a GET request to http://localhost:6969/api/users/ to view it ## Routes - Check availabe routes for http requests in user.routes.js in the backend
